title: Gilani prays for US President’s swift recovery
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 18 (APP):Senate Chairman Syed Yousaf Raza Gilani on Thursday extended good wishes to United States President Joe Biden for his “swift and complete” recovery after he tested positive for COVID-19.
In a statement, the chairman said that his prayers are with the US President and his family during this challenging time.
He expressed hope that President Joe Biden will soon recover and continue to lead and serve the American people effectively.
